label: Energy Systems Project
description: Design project pertinent to energy systems. Report, development of a Web site, and oral presentation required. 1 to 8 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Recommended: NPRE 481.
courseSectionInformation: 1 to 8 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Recommended: NPRE 481.
